subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Trevon Hughes matched his career high with 25 points, and third-seeded Wisconsin made Kansas State freshman star Michael Beasley disappear in the second half in a 72-55 victory.
snippet: Trevon Hughes matched his career high with 25 points, and third-seeded Wisconsin made Kansas State freshman star Michael Beasley disappear in the second half in a 72-55 victory.
